channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudflare -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-35152|2024-09-16T22:25:07.987Z -- cloudflare -- cloudflare%20warp%20for%20windows
item.description: Cloudflare WARP for Windows allows privilege escalation due to an unquoted service path. A malicious user or process running with non-administrative privileges can become an administrator by abusing the unquoted service path issue. Since version 1.2.2695.1, the vulnerability was fixed by adding quotes around the service's binary path. This issue affects Cloudflare WARP for Windows, versions prior to 1.2.2695.1.

item.title: CVE-2021-3911|2024-09-16T22:31:10.731Z -- cloudflare -- octorpki
item.description: If the ROA that a repository returns contains too many bits for the IP address then OctoRPKI will crash.
